articles.title: Nobody hurt when party bus erupts in flames on highway
articles.description: IRVINE, Calif. (AP) — At least two dozen passengers escaped unhurt after a party bus caught fire on a Southern California highway on New Year's Eve, authorities said.
articles.content:
IRVINE, Calif. (AP) At least two dozen passengers escaped unhurt after a party bus caught fire on a Southern California highway on New Year's Eve, authorities said.
Flames erupted as the bus was on northbound Interstate 405 Tuesday afternoon, the California … [+509 chars]

articles.author: By JOSEF FEDERMAN Associated Press
articles.title: Israel PM seeks immunity, buying time until after vote
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Wednesday he would seek immunity from corruption charges, likely delaying any trial until after March elections, when he hopes to have a majority coalition that will shield him from prosecution.
articles.content:
JERUSALEM (AP) Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Wednesday he would seek immunity from corruption charges, likely delaying any trial until after March elections, when he hopes to have a majority coalition that will shield him from prosecution.

articles.title: County executive urges Hogan to keep door open to refugees
articles.description: ANNAPOLIS, Md. (AP) — A county executive in Maryland is urging Gov. Larry Hogan to make the decision to continue to allow refugees into the state.
articles.content:
ANNAPOLIS, Md. (AP) A county executive in Maryland is urging Gov. Larry Hogan to make the decision to continue to allow refugees into the state.

articles.title: New law requires Maine insurers to cover hearing aids
articles.description: PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — A law taking effect on New Year's Day makes Maine the fifth state to require private health insurers to provide hearing aid benefit.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) A law taking effect on New Year's Day makes Maine the fifth state to require private health insurers to provide hearing aid benefit.
